summary.value: Embrace the currents and seize your destiny!

system.description:
ANGLER

ALSO: Cutlass, Sailor, Seafarer

Born amidst the ebb and flow of tranquil waters, the Angler shares a bond with the aquatic realm. With rod in hand and a profound connection to the depths, they navigate treacherous seas, casting their fate upon the shimmering surface.

Masters of finesse and patience, they draw power from the mysterious creatures that dwell beneath, channeling the very essence of water itself.

ANGLER FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

ANGLER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.akFeDTKm7alzKanM]{Cast Net} (SL2)

Spend 1 IP to get a net and make a melee attack 【DEX + INS + SL】 with it. If you hit, you can choose one of those two options: Reduce one enemy's next Accuracy Check or Magic Check by 【SL】 , or improve one of your ally's next Accuracy Check or Magic Check by 【SL】. This last until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Nab6k6o0N5kJEVov]{Fishing} (SL6)

Fish out of nowhere and get benefits based on the fish caught. On a success, if you are able to Equip the fish, you have the option to do a free attack with it, or trigger the effect of the fish if it's a Discovery, or store up to two fish in your inventory for later use.

Alternatively, instead of fishing a new fish, you can equip up to two fish from your inventory and attack. If you are holding two fishes or a fish and a weapon, you may choose to do two weapon fighting if applicable.

You may store up to 【SL】 fish in your inventory and you may fish up to 【SL】 times per scene.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.1fCaY2ogHQ9PMFJ1]{Improved Fishing}

Reduce your fishing die size by 1 (up to a minimum of d6) and Unique-rank bait will not be lost on a 7+.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.LIZqJawYLDxU7exx]{Reel It In!}

You may use your action to "reel in" an enemy, triggering an Opposed Check dependent on your narration. On a success, you may choose to do one of the following two options: If the enemy is in cover from someone using the Guard action, remove that cover from that enemy, OR steal @LOSS[2 ip] from the enemy.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.MjH3YagE4nfW76yC]{There Once Was A Ship…} (SL5)

You are able to communicate with creatures of Aquatic origin.

While resting in an area, you can sing sea shanties with your party to gain a party wide buff that is able to be used once by anyone: Your next HP or MP cost is reduced by 【SL × 2】. If multiple characters have this Skill, the effects are not cumulative.
This can be stacked with camp activities.
